io.micronaut.r2dbc.rxjava2

Interface RxStatement

  • All Superinterfaces:
    io.r2dbc.spi.Statement

    public interface RxStatement
extends io.r2dbc.spi.Statement
    Specialization of Statement for RxJava.

    1.0.0
    Author:
    graemerocher

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        io.reactivex.Flowable<? extends RxResult> execute()
        Executes one or more SQL statements and returns the RxResults. RxResult objects must be fully consumed to ensure full execution of the RxStatement.
        Specified by:
        execute in interface io.r2dbc.spi.Statement
        Returns:
        the RxResults, returned by each statement
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the statement is parametrized and not all parameter values are provided
